Package org.jungrapht.visualization.transform

Class MagnifyTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jungrapht.visualization.transform.MutableTransformerDecorator
      • org.jungrapht.visualization.transform.LensTransformer
        • org.jungrapht.visualization.transform.MagnifyTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BidirectionalTransformer, MutableTransformer, ShapeTransformer, ChangeEventSupport
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MagnifyShapeTransformer
    public class MagnifyTransformer
extends LensTransformer
implements MutableTransformer
    MagnifyTransformer wraps a MutableAffineTransformer and modifies the transform and inverseTransform methods so that they create an enlarging projection of the graph points.

    MagnifyTransformer uses an affine transform to cause translation, scaling, rotation, and shearing while applying a separate magnification filter in its transform and inverseTransform methods.

    Author:
    Tom Nelson
